posts.post_content:
Hey all, I'm going to start selling off most my set of T206s (gonna keep the tough ones) and thought I'd start here first.  Each card graded PSA 2, 3, or 4.  Quite a few SLers with Old Mill backs.  Let me know if you're looking for anything in particular.

Marty

I AM LOOKING FOR A T206 WITH Piedmont fact 42 back.
I am also looking for a Chief Myers fielding with the following backs for my back run , Am Beauty,Broadleaf,Cycle,or Tolstoi.

I also need the following commons in Grade 3 or 4

Abbattichio Blue Sleeves 
Dunn
Maggee Batting
Stahl Fielding

John P

Hi Marty

I'll be sending you a PM within a few minutes as to what I'm looking for.


Thanks

Jantz
Looking for SLer Howard, Germany Schaefer Detroit, Jennings port, mullin horizontal.
Marty, I'm looking for Gabby Street catching with a Sovereign back or a Hindu.

Just caught up on all my responses except for one (headed to you next Darren) and wanted to thank everyone for their patience.  I feel like I just rolled out Obamacare...

Marty
